title: Context7 Docs Request v1
description: Structured request for fetching documentation and examples from Context7.

library.description: Target library or framework id, e.g. 'ajv', 'cloudflare/workers'.

topic.description: Optional topic or feature within the library (e.g. 'draft-2020-12', 'KV basics').

question.description: Optional natural-language question to guide the query.

notes.description: Additional context for the agent about the project or constraints.

tags.description: Optional tags for later aggregation, e.g. ['cloudflare', 'workers', 'kv'].
